clauses.title: Third-party cookies are used for advertising
clauses.description: The service's website sets third-party cookies (cookies that do not belong to their domain) for purposes not including statistics and analytics.

clauses.title: Your personal data may be sold or otherwise transferred as part of a bankruptcy proceeding or other type of financial transaction
clauses.description: If the service gets acquired or is involved in a merger, bankruptcy, reorganisation or sale, your personal data may be transferred or sold.

clauses.title: Your content can be licensed to third parties
clauses.description: By posting content through the Services, users grant them a transferable and/or sublicensable right, which allows user content to be licensed to third parties.

clauses.title: You are tracked via web beacons, tracking pixels, browser fingerprinting, and/or device fingerprinting
clauses.description: Tracking technologies (such as web beacons, tracking pixels...) are employed on users and/or the service assigns a unique ID to a browser or device to track its behaviour.

clauses.title: This service receives your precise location through GPS coordinates
clauses.description: Unless the service relies on Geo Location, this case is to be assigned to points that don't need your GPS coordinates to function properly.

clauses.title: Your data may be processed and stored anywhere in the world
clauses.description: Your data is stored all over the world, including in countries where data protection rules may differ from the ones of the service's jurisdiction or those of your country jurisdiction.

clauses.title: You maintain ownership of your content
clauses.description: This service does not claim ownership over user-generated content or materials, and the user doesn't need to waive any moral rights by posting owned content.

clauses.title: The data retention period is kept to the minimum necessary for fulfilling its purposes
clauses.description: The service will remove personal data from its systems once it is no longer required. Depending on the type of information and the reason it was collected, data retention periods will vary.

clauses.title: Your personal data is not sold
clauses.description: This service makes an explicit promise not to sell "personal data" of users.

clauses.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users
clauses.description: The service has a different behavior towards users protected by the California Consumer Privacy Act.

clauses.title: The service has non-exclusive use of your content
clauses.description: The service can pay for your content and you are allowed to make it commercially available to other services/parties.

clauses.title: You should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify
clauses.description: The service may update the Terms without notice, but if they significantly change the agreements in a manner that importantly and/or negatively affects the way the service is used, users will be notified.

clauses.title: Your content can be distributed through any media known now or in the future
There is a date of the last update of the agreements
clauses.description: The given text has a date that allows to know when it was last updated.

clauses.title: Blocking first party cookies may limit your ability to use the service
clauses.description: Most browsers allow users to set preferences related to cookies storage. You may choose to block all cookies (including first-party cookies), but it may impact your use of this service and you may not be able to access some or any of the features provided.

clauses.title: You are prohibited from sending chain letters, junk mail, spam or any unsolicited messages
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to use the service for chain letters, junk mail, spamming or any other distribution of content to people who have not agreed to receiving it.

clauses.title: You are prohibited from attempting to gain unauthorized access to other computer systems
clauses.description: The service does not allow any attempts at hacking or otherwise gaining unauthorized access to other users' computers.

clauses.title: You are prohibited from posting content which promotes violence or politically or religiously extremist values.
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to post extremist political or religious content. They are also not allowed to post content that glorifies violence.

clauses.title: The posting of pornographic content is prohibited
clauses.description: Users are not allowed to post any content of pornographic nature. This includes adult content, things that are sexually explicit, or obscene.

clauses.title: This service is only available to users over a certain age
clauses.description: The Services are intended for users who are at least a certain age. If you are younger than the age required then you are prohibited from using the Service.

clauses.title: Do Not Track (DNT) headers are ignored and you are tracked anyway even if you set this header.
clauses.description: Even though the Do Not Track (DNT) header was not implemented perfectly, services should not track users whose browsers send a DNT header.

clauses.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
